user_description: Converts FASTA file to KBaseGenomes.Genome json string. Note the MD5 for the contig is generated by uppercasing the sequence. The Genome MD5 is generated by taking the MD5 of joining the sorted list of individual contig MD5s with a comma separator
developer_description: Converts FASTA file to KBaseGenomes.Genome json string. Note the MD5 for the contig is generated by uppercasing the sequence. The Genome MD5 is generated by taking the MD5 of joining the sorted list of individual contig MD5s with a comma separator

user_options.name: genome_id
user_options.help: Genome_id prefix in WS. If not supplied, will default the base input_file_name
